com.viaoa.jfc

Class OAPopupTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JTree
            • com.viaoa.jfc.OATree
              • com.viaoa.jfc.OAPopupTree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.dnd.DragGestureListener, java.awt.dnd.DropTargetListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.TreeExpansionListener, javax.swing.event.TreeSelectionListener, javax.swing.Scrollable

    public class OAPopupTree
extends OATree
    Popup OATree that is controlled by mouse click on another component.

    Example:
    OAPopupTree tree = new OAPopupTree(); JButton cmd = new JButton("See Tree"); dc.setButton(cmd); -- or -- OACommand cmd = new OACommand(hubEmployee); dc.setButton(cmd);

    For more information about this package, see documentation.

    See Also:
    OAPopup, OATree, Serialized Form
